scripts.link-chassis: cd node_modules/@chassis && npm link @chassis/core && npm link @chassis/gulp && cd ../..
scripts.build-chassis-select: cd wc-builder/ && build-webcomponent ../webcomponents/src/chassis-select ../webcomponents/dist --es5 && build-webcomponent ../webcomponents/src/chassis-options ../webcomponents/dist --es5 && build-webcomponent ../webcomponents/src/chassis-option ../webcomponents/dist --es5 && build-webcomponent ../webcomponents/src/chassis-selected-options ../webcomponents/dist --es5 && build-webcomponent ../webcomponents/src/chassis-optgroup ../webcomponents/dist --es5 && build-webcomponent ../webcomponents/src/chassis-optgroup-label ../webcomponents/dist --es5 && cd .. && npm run bundle-chassis-select && npm run build-showroom
scripts.build-chassis-cycle: cd wc-builder/ && build-webcomponent ../webcomponents/src/chassis-cycle ../webcomponents/dist --es5 && npm run build-showroom
scripts.bundle-webcomponents: npm run bundle-chassis-select && npm run bundle-chassis-datalist && npm run bundle-chassis-layout
scripts.build-showroom: cd showroom/ && npm run build --prod && cd ..
scripts.build-showroom-dev: cd showroom/ && npm run build --dev && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build-webcomponents && npm run bundle-webcomponents && cp webcomponents/dist/*.js showroom/src/webcomponents && npm run build-showroom
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-webcomponents && npm run bundle-webcomponents && cp webcomponents/dist/*.js showroom/src/webcomponents && npm run build-showroom-dev
